data.name: DUAL GEAR
data.detailed_description:
Dual Gear Pre-Alpha for Steam Version

Come and Support us on INDIEGOGO!

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/dual-gear-mecha-turn-based-x-action-game/x/3779912

Dual Gear is a turn based strategy game combination with action gameplay inspired from classical japanese mech TBS games . Player can command the units with turn based system from the third person action perspective ,develop a pilot, customize their own mechs squad to finish the mission and find the secret parts,weapons ,story. The game is powered by Unreal Engine 4 and still in development. Also the game need your help for funding on Indiegogo pls visit and backe us! The Final week is coming!

data.short_description: DUAL GEAR is a Tactical Action Turn-Base game presented by Japanese Mecha Inspired. Pilot your mech with the real-time tactical and Command your squad with turn-based element!
data.reviews:
“They like Front Mission… total win!”
Playstation Life Style

“The turn based action in DUAL GEAR looks engaging and multifaceted.”
Operationrainfall

“Semi-Real Mecha square off in a satisfying plod.”
Wargamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel quad-core Q6600,AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550,VGA AMD 7750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Six-core CPU,Intel quad-core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960,VGA AMD 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 6970 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not support for MAC without Graphics Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M290 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not support for MAC without Graphics Card
